00244    inline bool AverageStage::hasChild() const
00245    { return bool(childPtr_); }

00249    { return *childPtr_; }

00253    /*
00254    * Serialize this stage.
00255    */
00256    template <class Archive>
00257    void AverageStage::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00258    {
00259       ar & sum_;
00260       ar & sumSq_;
00261       ar & blockSum_;
00262       ar & nSample_;
00263       ar & nBlockSample_;
00264       ar & stageInterval_;
00265       ar & blockFactor_;
00266 
00267       // Does this stage have a child?
00268       int hasChild;
00269       if (Archive::is_saving()) {
00270          hasChild = (childPtr_ == 0) ? 0 : 1;
00271       }
00272       ar & hasChild;
00273 
00274       // Serialize child (if any)
00275       if (hasChild) {
00276          if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00277             long nextStageInterval = stageInterval_*blockFactor_;
00278             int  nextStageId       = stageId_ + 1;
00279             childPtr_ = new AverageStage(nextStageInterval, nextStageId,
00280                                          rootPtr_, blockFactor_);
00281             rootPtr_->registerDescendant(childPtr_);
00282          }
00283          ar & (*childPtr_);
00284       } else {
00285          if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00286             childPtr_ = 0;
00287          }
00288       }
00289 
00290    }
00291 
00292 }
